title: Wormhole-inspired teleportation (WIT)
description: The WIT benchmark schema definition. Supports legacy mode (num_qubits: 6 or 7) or generalized mode (n_qubits_per_side). Advanced physics parameters use sensible defaults from the original WIT benchmark.

benchmark_name.description: Name of the benchmark. Must be 'WIT' for this schema.

shots.description: Number of measurement shots (repetitions) to use for the benchmark.

n_qubits_per_side.description: Number of qubits on each side of the thermofield double state. Use this for generalized WIT circuits of any size.

num_qubits.description: Legacy field for compatibility with fixed 6- or 7-qubit WIT circuits. Use n_qubits_per_side for generalized circuits instead.
